title: PIXEL 3 XL Downgrade to Pie via ABD SIDELOAD Failing, Error total xfer : 1.00x
content:
Hello, my pixel 3 xl has locked bootloader and i had upgraded it to Android Q beta program. It is stuck on booting screen and unfortunately i can not get into android. I downloaded FULL OTA images for crosshatch and tried to adb sideload android 9.0 to my device but always fail and get this error 

Error total xfer : 1.00x 

On the phone i get the following error ; 

Failed to verify package compability matrix are incompatible: Missing config CONFIG_NETFILTER_XT_Match_QTAGUID

I am stuck with a paperweight at the moment with locked bootloader and no access to android itself to click " ALLOW OEM UNLOCK " option. Please help me overcome this nightmare.
